Scribble Shooter Wizard Boss Companion
Cody Knightmare

Cody Knightmare
Cody Knightmare
コーディ・ナイトメア
스크리블 슈터 마법사 보스 애완동물
Scribble Shooter Wizard Boss Companion
Scribble Shooter巫師終極敵人隨身夥伴
Scribble Shooter巫師終極敵人隨身夥伴
Cody Knightmare
kDesc
Impress your friends by purchasing the Cody Knightmare - Scribble Shooter Wizard Boss Companion! He doesn't really have any magic, but he will protect you from being lame.[#Legal]
Impressionnez vos amis en achetant Cody Knightmare, votre nouveau compagnon et grand magicien Scribble Shooter ! En fait, il ne fait pas vraiment de magie, mais il vous évitera d'être un nul.[#Legal]
Wer den "Scribble Shooter"-Zaubererboss Cody Knightmare kauft, kann seine Freunde schwer beeindrucken! Er kann nicht wirklich zaubern, aber er schützt davor, eine Trantüte zu werden.[#Legal]
Sorprendi i tuoi amici acquistando Cody Knightmare, l'amico stregone di Scribble Shooter! In realtà non ha nessun potere, ma almeno sembrerai più fico.[#Legal]
¡Impresiona a tus amigos comprando esta mascota jefe brujo de Scribble Shooter, Cody Knightmare! No es que sepa usar magia, pero te protegerá de dar mala imagen.[#Legal]
コーディ・ナイトメアはScribble Shooterのウィザードボス。魔法の力はないが、不思議…一緒に付いてくるとカッコ良く見えてくる！[#Legal]
코디 나이트메어는 바로 스크리블 슈터의 마법사 보스 애완동물입니다! 비록 마법을 사용할 수는 없지만, 소유자의 품격을 한층 높여주는 신비한 역할을 합니다.[#Legal]
Impress your friends by purchasing the Cody Knightmare - Scribble Shooter Wizard Boss Companion! He doesn't really have any magic, but he will protect you from being lame.[#Legal]
購買這款Cody Knightmare-Scribble Shooter巫師終極敵人隨身夥伴，來讓你的朋友嘆為觀止！雖然他沒有魔法能力，但能保護你，以防你站不住腳。[#Legal]
購買這款Cody Knightmare-Scribble Shooter巫師終極敵人隨身夥伴，來讓你的朋友嘆為觀止！雖然他沒有魔法能力，但能保護你，以防你站不住腳。[#Legal]
Impress your friends by purchasing the Cody Knightmare - Scribble Shooter Wizard Boss Companion! He doesn't really have any magic, but he will protect you from being lame.[#Legal]
